hosttemplate.description: New MySQL host template with advanced monitoring
hosttemplate.name: Database - MySQL Server

servicecheck.description: Number of bytes received (total) - add "-w X -c X" for warning and critical alerts at end of arguments.
servicecheck.name: MySQL Bytes received

servicecheck.description: Number of bytes sent (total)  - add "-w X -c X" for warning and critical alerts at end of arguments.
servicecheck.name: MySQL Bytes sent

servicecheck.description: Key blocks unused - add "-w value -c value" to warning/critical thresholds.
servicecheck.name: MySQL Key blocks unused

servicecheck.description: Key blocks used  - add "-w X -c X" for warning and critical alerts at end of arguments.
servicecheck.name: MySQL Key blocks used

servicecheck.description: MySQL open tables - add "-w X -c X" for warning and critical alerts at end of arguments.
servicecheck.name: MySQL Open tables

servicecheck.description: Number of open temp tables on slaves
servicecheck.name: MySQL Slave open temp tables

servicecheck.description: Number of retried transactions on slaves
servicecheck.name: MySQL Slave retried transactions
